ModMetaData.name: Smart Speed
ModMetaData.author: Sarg
ModMetaData.description:
Allows the use of ultra speed and change event speed multiplier.
<size=24>Features</size>
- Enable ultra fast speed without Dev Mode - Add ultra speed icon - Set Event speed multiplier - Mod options: configure how much each of the speeds affects the game
<size=24>Event Speed Mode</size>
- Right click on speed control UI - Slow : x0.5 speed (half of normal speed) - Normal : x1 speed (default setting) - Fast : x2 speed (double of normal speed) - Half : Half of current game speed - Ignore : Ignore force event speed
